mapper.select: select m.uid, m.password, m.tpassword, m.photo, m.isblack,m.toFrom, m.regip, m.regdate, m.lastloginip, m.lastlogintime, m.type, m.status, m.regfrom, m.mobileverify, m.realverify, m.loginverify, m.emailverify, m.recommCodes, m.mobilephone,b.email,b.realname,b.birthdate,b.idcards,b.sex from dr_member m left join dr_member_base_info b on m.uid=b.uid where m.uid = #{uid:INTEGER}
select count(1) from dr_member where mobilephone = #{mobilephone}

select count(r.id) from dr_product_invest_repayinfo r left join dr_product_info p ON r.pid = p.id where p.type=2 and uid = #{uid} AND shouldTime >= '2016-11-25' AND shouldTime < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 5 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into dr_member (mobilephone, password, tpassword, isblack, regdate,status, mobileverify, realverify, loginverify, emailverify,level, recommCodes, toFrom,tid,regip,lastloginip,lastlogintime) values (#{mobilephone}, #{passWord:CHAR}, #{tpassWord:CHAR}, #{isBlack:INTEGER}, #{regDate:TIMESTAMP}, #{status:INTEGER}, #{mobileVerify:INTEGER}, #{realVerify:INTEGER}, #{loginVerify:INTEGER}, #{emailVerify:INTEGER}, #{level:INTEGER},#{recommCodes:VARCHAR},#{toFrom:VARCHAR},#{tid:VARCHAR},#{regIp:VARCHAR},#{lastLoginIp:VARCHAR},#{lastLoginTime:TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select m.uid, m.password, m.tpassword, m.photo, m.status,m.tofrom, m.regfrom, m.mobileverify, m.realverify, m.loginverify, m.emailverify, m.recommCodes, m.regdate,m.mobilephone,b.email,b.realname,b.idcards,b.birthdate,b.sex,m.regip from dr_member m left join dr_member_base_info b on m.uid=b.uid where m.mobilephone = #{mobilephone}
select concat(substring(mobilePhone,1,3),"****",substring(mobilePhone,8)) as mobilePhone from dr_member where recommCodes = #{recommCode}
select * from dr_member where mobilephone = #{str} or recommCodes = #{str}
select tofrom from dr_member m where uid=#{uid} and exists (select `code` from dr_channel_info where isParticipation=0 and INSTR(toFrom,code)=1 )
select count(uid) as regCount,(SELECT sum(amount) from dr_product_invest) as investCumulative ,sum(investProfit+spreadProfit) as profitCumulative from dr_member_funds
select concat(left(mobilePhone,3),'****',right(mobilePhone,4)) mobilePhone,DATE_FORMAT(regdate,'%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regdate from dr_member ORDER BY uid DESC LIMIT 100
